mapper.sql: user_id, user_pw, pay_id, pay_pw, name, sex, marry, birthday, mobile, mail, qq, country, province, city, district, address, w_code, w_name, w_logo, memo, ywgm, hys, jzbs, jwbs, at_time
mapper.select: select user_id as userId, user_pw as userPw, pay_id as payId, pay_pw as payPw, name, CASE WHEN sex="1" THEN "男" WHEN sex="2" THEN "女" ELSE "X" END AS sex, marry, YEAR(CURDATE()) - YEAR(birthday) AS age, mobile, mail, qq, country, province, city, district, address, w_code as wCode, w_name as wName, w_logo as wLogo, memo, ywgm, hys, jzbs, jwbs, at_time as atTime from user where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT id, b.app_id AS appId,b.user_id AS userId,NAME,b.sex AS sex,YEAR(CURDATE()) - YEAR(birthday) AS age,CASE WHEN ap='0' THEN "9:00-12:00" WHEN ap='1' THEN "14:00-16:00" END AS apm,wLogo,description,memo,report,result,picture FROM reserve LEFT JOIN (SELECT id,app_id,a.user_id,NAME,CASE WHEN sex="1" THEN "男" WHEN sex="2" THEN "女" ELSE "X" END AS sex,birthday,wLogo,description,memo,report,result,picture FROM case_record RIGHT JOIN (SELECT app_id,user.user_id,NAME,sex,birthday,w_logo AS wLogo FROM USER LEFT JOIN mp_user ON user.user_id=mp_user.user_id) AS a ON case_record.user_id=a.user_id) AS b ON b.user_id=reserve.user_id WHERE WEEK=#{week,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, user_pw, pay_id, pay_pw, name, sex, marry, birthday, mobile, mail, qq, country, province, city, district, address, w_code, w_name, w_logo, memo, ywgm, hys, jzbs, jwbs, at_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payPw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{marry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ywgm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hys,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jzbs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jwbs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{atTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update user
user_pw = #{userPw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_id = #{payId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_pw = #{payPw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
marry = #{marry,jdbcType=INTEGER},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mail = #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
w_code = #{wCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
w_name = #{wName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
w_logo = #{wLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ywgm = #{ywgm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hys = #{hys,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jzbs = #{jzbs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jwbs = #{jwbs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
at_time = #{atTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update user set user_pw = #{userPw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_id = #{payId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_pw = #{payPw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, marry = #{marry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mail = #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w_code = #{wCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w_name = #{wName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w_logo = #{wLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ywgm = #{ywgm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hys = #{hys,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jzbs = #{jzbs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jwbs = #{jwbs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, at_time = #{atTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
